sourcesContent:
<script setup>

</script>

<template>
  <input
   v-model="newTask" placeholder="Enter a description"/>
  <button @click="addTask(description)">Add Task (enter description)</button>

</template>

<script>
import api from "@/services/api";


export default {
  props: ["description"],

  methods: {
    async addTask(description) {
      try {
        await api.rmTasks(description);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erreur lors de la récupération du titre :', error);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>


<style scoped>

</style>
